LanguageData.BloodWarmer.label: blood warmer
LanguageData.BloodWarmer.description: A modified human kidney reconfigured to heat the blood of a ghoul, allowing survival in extremely cold environments.
LanguageData.PilotAssistant.label: pilot assistant
LanguageData.PilotAssistant.description: An installed pilot assistant. This neural interface connects a pilot's brain directly to a vehicle, enhancing the pilot's control and reaction speed.
LanguageData.SentienceCatalyst.label: sentience catalyst
LanguageData.SentienceCatalyst.description: Special mechanites have enhanced the neural pathways of this animal, allowing for training that would not otherwise be possible.
